original_text: praising God and having favor with all the people. And the Lord added to their number day by day those who were being saved.
korean_text: 하나님을 찬미하며 또 온 백성에게 칭송을 받으니 주께서 구원 받는 사람을 날마다 더하게 하시니라

sentences.original_text: and having favor with all the people.
And the Lord added to their number day by day
